trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of related sections within a configuration file.
Use the ConfigurationSectionCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> objects.
You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Sections%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.Sections%2A> property.
The ConfigurationSectionCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
The name of the section to be added.
The section to be added.
Clears this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to an array.
The array to copy the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object to.
The index location at which to begin copying.
array is .
The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
Gets the number of sections in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
An integer that represents the number of sections in the collection.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
name is null or an empty string ("").
Gets an enumerator that can iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object whose key is to be returned.
The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
Used by the system during serialization.
The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
This property gets the specified entry of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> object.
In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection> class.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object to be returned.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object with the specified name.
Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the keys of all sections in this collection.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
The name of the section to be removed.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> object.
The index of the section to be removed.
